Vegan Vitality Omega 3 Algae Oil is the healthier & more environmentally friendly alternative to fish oil. Did you know that Omega 3 is naturally produced by algae, not fish? As fish contain Omega 3 because they eat algae, Vegan Vitality Omega 3 Algae Oil is farmed from directly algae not fish. This gives you a super concentrated plant based vegan omega 3 source with similar benefits of fish oil, but without the fish! Our algae oil capsules contain some of the highest quantities of vegan omega 3 available at 400mg DHA per capsule, providing two months supply and are now also carrageenan free. Product Benefits: PURER THAN FISH OIL: Algal oil doesn't contain any of the contaminants found in fish oil such as hazardous substances like heavy metals, PCBs and dioxins. 100% SUSTAINABLE: 25% of the global fish catch is used for the fish oil industry. As fish get their Omega 3 from Algae, our Algae oil cuts out this unsustainable and unnecessary waste of life. NO FISHY SMELL: Studies have show that many fish oils are rancid. Our Omega 3 is 100% pure and doesn't smell funny or leave a nasty aftertaste. SIMILAR BENEFITS AS REGULAR FISH OIL, BUT WITHOUT THE FISH!: 100% VEGAN: Vegan Vitality Algae Oil is 100% vegetable based and grown in a 100% contamination free environment. SUPERIOR ALTERNATIVE TO FLAXSEED: Studies have shown that the chemical structure of Omega 3 from Flaxseed doesn't transform into nutrients as easily as Algae oil. 400mg DHA PER CAPSULE & 2 MONTHS SUPPLY: Our super concentrated capsules offer some of the highest quantities of Omega 3 per capsule available, more than you will find in many other algae oil products and offer 2 months supply. Ingredients: Active: 100% vegan algae oil (50% DHA), Vitamin E (dl-Alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate).Softgel Capsule: Cassava Starch (non-GMO), Vegetable Glycerine (from soybeans), Purified Water. Allergy Advice: For allergens, see ingredients in bold. Related Blogs: The Benefits Of Algae Oil V Fish OilWhat Supplements Should Vegans Take?

products.product_name: Super Mushroom Complex: A Formula Of 6 Powerful Mushrooms
products.description: For thousands of years in traditional medicines, mushrooms have been used for their various potential health benefits including antioxidant properties, support your natural defences, and supporting general health.More recently, scientific studies have upheld the remarkable health benefits of mushrooms. In particular, mushrooms that are high in enzymes, polysaccharides, and protein-bound polysaccharides.Vegan Vitality’s Super Mushroom Complex provides you with an equal mix of 6 mushrooms renowned for their health benefits: Lion’s Mane, Reishi, Chaga, Shitake, Cordyceps and Maitake.Our product contains a high quality formula with 30% polysaccharides, and unbeatable value with 500mg capsules and 120 capsules per pouch.What’s more, its 100% vegan, and contains natural ingredients with no fillers, binders or additives. Just pure mushroom goodness! Product Benefits: An equal mix of 6 powerful mushrooms renowned for their health benefits: Lion’s Mane, Reishi, Chaga, Shitake, Cordyceps and Maitake High strength, High quality formula. Our product has a high strength 30% polysaccharides formula that equals a 30 : 1 extract per mushroom. The whole mushroom equivalent equals 15000mg Unbeatable value with 500mg capsules and 120 capsules per pouch. THE best value high strength mushroom formula you will find Natural Ingredients - No fillers, binders or additives. GMO free and gluten free. Just pure mushroom goodness! 100% Vegan and kind to the environment. Low waste and fully recyclable pouches Containing An Equal Mix Of 6 Mushrooms Renowned For Their Health Benefits: Lion’s ManeLion’s mane mushrooms, are large, white, shaggy mushrooms that resemble a lion’s mane as they grow. They are believed to have strong anti-inflammatory, antioxidant and natural defence abilities, as well as a variety of other benefits.ReishiIn China, Reishi has earned the nickname “king of mushrooms” due to their links with longevity and mental clarity. They have a variety of potential health benefits, including boosting natural defences and helping to improve energy levels. ChagaFor centuries, chaga has been used as a traditional medicine in Russia and other Northern European countries, mainly to boost immunity and overall health.They are low in calories, very high in fiber and loaded with antioxidants.ShiitakeFor hundreds of years, shiitake mushrooms have been a popular food and health source in Asia. They’re the second most popular edible mushroom in the world.They are packed with B vitamins, minerals and other health-promoting compounds. They are also believed to contain naturally occurring compounds and promote nutrient support for everyday health.CordycepsCordyceps is often referred to as the caterpillar fungus because of its thin, tubular shape. They are believed to have energy boosting and detoxifying properties.Maitake“Maitake” means dancing mushroom in Japanese. The mushroom is said to have gotten its name after people danced with happiness upon finding it in the wild, such are its reputed healing properties. Maitake is rich in antioxidants, vitamins B and C, copper, potassium, fiber, minerals and amino acids, and is believed to support overall immunity. Related Blogs: The Benefits Of Medicinal Mushrooms

Vegan Vitality Collagen Complex is designed to provide you with plant based way to boost your collagen, and improve your skin, hair, nails, bones and joints, naturally and sustainably. Why Take A Collagen Supplement?Collagen is the most abundant protein found in the body and is responsible for keeping joints healthy, adding firmness and structure to skin, and strengthening hair and nails. Unfortunately collagen production decreases as we age, so taking a supplement is sometimes necessary. Our product provides a natural, plant based and sustainable way to boost your collagen, and improve your skin hair, nails, bones and joints. Choose Vegan Collagen!Unlike other Collagen products, we use natural plant based extracts such as Acerola Cherry and Bamboo, plus L-lysine, Biotin and 5 other essential vitamins. Our unique formula is designed to support collagen growth without the use of Bovine, fish or marine ingredients, providing you with a completely vegan, sustainable alternative. Why Vegan Vitality Collagen Complex? 1 Tablet A Day And 2 Months Supply:Our super concentrated 500mg capsules are formulated to be only required to be taken once a day. Offering superb value with 60 capsules and 2 months supply. Other vegan collagen products do not contain the levels per capsule our product provides and do not offer the same value. Kraft Paper PackagingOur ecologically friendly, smaller Kraft Paper pouches minimise wastage and plastic use, and are fully recyclable. As our product is UK manufactured, this also cuts down on carbon footprint. UK Manufactured To GMP StandardsOur product is UK manufactured to GMP standards. As with all Vegan Vitality products its also 3rd party tested by independent laboratories to ensure quality and safety for you. Its also GMO, gluten, and allergen free. Related Blogs: What Supplements Should Vegans Take? Your Guide To Vegan Collagen

products.product_name: Vegan Multivitamins & Minerals with High B12, D3 & K2
products.description: Designed for vegans, vegetarians and those following mainly plant based diets, our vegan multivitamin provides a high strength dose of vitamin B12, vitamin D3, vitamin K2, as well as 20 other vitamins and minerals. One tablet a day is easily enough to meet your requirements for B12, D3, K2, Zinc, Iron and other vital vitamins and minerals. And one bottle contains 180 tablets, enough to last you half a year. So why take 3 to 4 different supplements, when you can get everything you need in one bottle! Product Benefits: HIGH STRENGTH FORMULA contains 50ug of Vitamin B12, 20ug of D3, 75ug of K2 plus a high dose of 20 other vitamins and minerals. More than you will find in many other multivitamins. DESIGNED SPECIFICALLY FOR VEGANS & VEGETARIANS, SUITABLE FOR EVERYONE. Vegan Vitality Multivitamins & Minerals have been specifically designed to meet the nutritional requirements of vegans, vegetarians and those following plant based diets, whilst also being suitable for non vegans and vegetarians. HALF A YEAR’S SUPPLY IN ONE BOTTLE. Our product provides exceptional value, giving you with 180 tablets per pack keeping you replenished for up to 6 months. FREE FROM sugar, gluten, wheat, nuts, soy, eggs, GMO substances and all animal products. Our product is also free from Cyanocobalamin, we only use Methylcobalam for our B12 source, the most bio-available form of B12. EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN ONE BOTTLE! Why buy 3-4 different vegan supplements, when you can get of your vitamin requirements in one bottle! 1 tablet a day is easily enough to meet your requirements for B12, D3, K2, Zinc, Iron and other vital vitamins and minerals. Related Blogs: What Supplements Should Vegans Take?
